com.att.research.xacml.api

Interface Result

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EvaluationResult, JaxpResult, StdMutableResult, StdResult

    public interface Result
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML Result elements. Results communicate the Decision, Status, Attributes, Obligations, and Advice for an individual decision request.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Implementations of this interface must override the equals method with the following semantics: Two Results (r1 and r2) are equal if: r1.getDecision() == r2.getDecision() AND r1.getStatus().equals(r2.getStatus() AND r1.getObligations() is pair-wise equal to r2.getObligations() r1.getAssociatedAdvice() is pair-wise equal to r2.getAssociatedAdvice() r1.getAttributes() is pair-wise equal to r2.getAttributes() r1.getPolicyIdentifiers() is pair-wise equal to r2.getPolicyIdentifiers() r1.getPolicySetIdentifiers() is pair-wise equal to r2.getPolicySetIdentifiers()
      java.util.Collection<Advice> getAssociatedAdvice()
      Gets the Collection of Advice objects in this Result.
      java.util.Collection<AttributeCategory> getAttributes()
      Gets the Collection of AttributeCategory objects in this Result.
      Decision getDecision()
      Gets the Decision associated with this Result.
      java.util.Collection<Obligation> getObligations()
      Gets the Collection of Obligations int this Result.
      java.util.Collection<IdReference> getPolicyIdentifiers()
      Gets the Collection of IdReference objects referring to XACML 3.0 Policies that are in this Result.
      java.util.Collection<IdReference> getPolicySetIdentifiers()
      Gets the Collection of IdReference objects referring to XACML 3.0 PolicySets that are in this Result.
      Status getStatus()
      Gets the Status associated with this Result.

    • Method Detail

      • getDecision

        Decision getDecision()
        Gets the Decision associated with this Result.
        Returns:
        the Decision associated with this Result.

      • getStatus

        Status getStatus()
        Gets the Status associated with this Result.
        Returns:
        the Status associated with this Result

      • getObligations

        java.util.Collection<Obligation> getObligations()
        Gets the Collection of Obligations int this Result. If there are no Obligations this method must return an empty Collection.
        Returns:
        the Collection of Obligations Result.

      • getAssociatedAdvice

        java.util.Collection<Advice> getAssociatedAdvice()
        Gets the Collection of Advice objects in this Result. If there are no Advice codes this method must return an empty Collection.
        Returns:
        the Collection of Advice objects in this Result.

      • getAttributes

        java.util.Collection<AttributeCategory> getAttributes()
        Gets the Collection of AttributeCategory objects in this Result. If there are no AttributeCategory objects this method must return an empty Collection.
        Returns:
        the Collection of AttributeCategory objects in this Result.

      • getPolicyIdentifiers

        java.util.Collection<IdReference> getPolicyIdentifiers()
        Gets the Collection of IdReference objects referring to XACML 3.0 Policies that are in this Result.
        Returns:
        the Collection of Policy IdReferences in this Result.

      • getPolicySetIdentifiers

        java.util.Collection<IdReference> getPolicySetIdentifiers()
        Gets the Collection of IdReference objects referring to XACML 3.0 PolicySets that are in this Result.
        Returns:
        the Collection of PolicySet IdReferences in this Result.

      • equals

        boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Implementations of this interface must override the equals method with the following semantics: Two Results (r1 and r2) are equal if: r1.getDecision() == r2.getDecision() AND r1.getStatus().equals(r2.getStatus() AND r1.getObligations() is pair-wise equal to r2.getObligations() r1.getAssociatedAdvice() is pair-wise equal to r2.getAssociatedAdvice() r1.getAttributes() is pair-wise equal to r2.getAttributes() r1.getPolicyIdentifiers() is pair-wise equal to r2.getPolicyIdentifiers() r1.getPolicySetIdentifiers() is pair-wise equal to r2.getPolicySetIdentifiers()
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
